body:
Young, dynamic and creative Online Marketing Department looking for a front-end developer.

Some experience in capital markets, FOREX, binary options or gaming would be highly appreciated, but are not a must.

You will be working on a new project, for an international private trading company that provides reliable and renowned investment solutions.

We want our team to be made ONLY of capable, serious, hard-working and positive people.

We would be happy to welcome on board people that are willing to commit on long term, are able to work in an international environment and wish to develop by our side.

Requirements:

* 2+ years’ experience 
* background with cross-browser and cross-platform compatible web design and development (HTML5, CSS3, JS, Bootstrap)
* ability to work independently and take responsibility 
* innovative, curios and driven

* past experience in the Forex/Binary markets – Advantage

We are recruiting passionate and motivated people, able to deliver results against objectives and meet the company expectations in a professional and dynamic manner.

We invest heavily in the development of our people, and RMM gives you plenty of opportunities for individual initiative and responsibility.

Submit your candidacy and let's get to know each other.
title: Front-end developer for our Marketing Department
